metadata.title: CVE-2023-1210 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.9 before 16.0.8, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.3, allversions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.2. It was possible to leak a user'semail via an error message for groups that restrict membership by emaildomain.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
